graphql.query:
query GetAllPendingBls {
  getAllPendingBls {
    _id
    document
    documentNumber
    TerminalOpsId
    doStatus {
      timestamp
      documents {
        goodsDeclaration
        loloReceipt
        blStamped
        underTakings
        payOrder
      }
      statusNumber
      comment
      TerminalOpsId
      status
    }
    doOfficeInfo {
      account
      arrivedDate
      bank
      charges
      doDate
      emptyReturn
      clearingAgents {
        name
        phoneNumber
      }
      houseBL
      clearingPoc {
        name
        phoneNumber
      }
      client
      clientPoc {
        name
        phoneNumber
      }
      securityDeposit
      gatePassAttachment
      doAttachment
      detention
      title
      doBroker
      containerOtherCharges
      readyToMove
      rtmTS
    }
    shippingLine
    status
    pendingNo
    returnDT
    gatePassDocument
    containerNumber
    createdBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}

query GetAllTerminalOps {
  getAllTerminalOps {
    _id
    User {
      _id
      firstName
      lastName
      phoneNumber
      email
      profileImage
      
      cnic
      UserType {
        _id
        userType
      }
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
    PendingBls {
      TerminalOpsId
      documentNumber
      document
      _id
      doStatus {
        status
        TerminalOpsId
        comment
        documents {
          goodsDeclaration
          blStamped
          loloReceipt
          underTakings
          payOrder
        }
        statusNumber
        timestamp
      }
      doOfficeInfo {
        clearingAgents {
          name
          phoneNumber
        }
        account
        arrivedDate
        bank
        charges
        doDate
        emptyReturn
        houseBL
        clearingPoc {
          name
          phoneNumber
        }
        client
        clientPoc {
          name
          phoneNumber
        }
        securityDeposit
        gatePassAttachment
        doAttachment
        detention
        title
        doBroker
        containerOtherCharges
        readyToMove
        rtmTS
      }
      shippingLine
      status
      pendingNo
      returnDT
      gatePassDocument
      containerNumber
      createdBy
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
    DoStatuses {
      _id
      status
      TerminalOpsId
      OrderId
      comment
      documents {
        goodsDeclaration
        loloReceipt
        underTakings
        blStamped
        payOrder
      }
      statusNumber
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
    isBlocked
    platform
    versionCode
    versionName
    notifToken
    createdAt
    updatedAt
  }
}
